entry.title: Ok to use 0.8.x?
entry.summary: Bitcoin version 0.8.0 is considered safe for all users except for those who are involved in creating blocks, such as solo miners or pool operators. However, even these users can still use the software if they connect to the network through a 0.7 node. It is important to note that Bitcoin version 0.8.0 is safe for all other purposes, making it a viable option for most users.
